name: BeInspiredWithDailyAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Often as we go through the day and through life we just need a bit of motivation and/or inspiration. That is what Daily Inspirations from Halo is meant to do inspire, encourage, and life you up when you are feeling a little exhausted or fatigued. Just ask for your inspitational briefing from Halo, and be inspired for the next several hours.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
